item.title: CVE-2017-13200|2024-08-05T18:58:12.701Z -- google%20inc. -- android

item.title: CVE-2017-13177|2024-08-05T18:58:12.620Z -- google%20inc. -- android
item.description: In several functions of libhevc, NEON registers are not preserved. This could lead to remote code execution as a privileged process with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Product: Android. Versions: 5.1.1, 6.0, 6.0.1, 7.0, 7.1.1, 7.1.2, 8.0, 8.1. Android ID: A-68320413.

item.description: In the ihevcd_parse_slice_header function of ihevcd_parse_slice_header.c a slice address of zero after the first slice could result in an infinite loop.
